post.body: I click all the time -- but that's an occupational hazard!
Yeah, Hulu has great design -- one of the best video players out there. And it's got the biggest numbers for online video.
Parties? I'm barely going to finish my 2008 projects before New Years!
I miss Boris!
chainsaw to the groin -- awesome!
Wow, and you riled up a Vermont freeper too!
Painful. Why does Santa's elf have a tan?
Who has money to manage?
The car is amazing, but so is the SolidWorks software.
man, you've lately become twitter caffeinated!
Tough call. So many sci-fi films are crossover horror. One of my old favorites is Invaders From Mars (1953). Ooh, paranoia!
hey were you in Lexington? I've seen that mannequin.
What's up? How do you like Tag?
here's an oldie but I still thinks it's elegant. (reminds me of the unicel bubble site...) http://www.popularfront.com/snowdays
btw, Happy Holidays!
What do you think? Next social ad platform -- or total user revolt? http://tinyurl.com/5xjpa4
Not quite in the Xmas spirit, but I like it: http://tinyurl.com/5v3scd
Hey, the economic meltdown is driving people to the web! GOOD TIMES ;-) http://www.nytimes.com/2008/11/23/business/23steal.html
iPhone emerging as major gaming platform http://www.cnbc.com/id/28236721
Interesting! Digital influencers go online AFTER learning about something from TV or print. http://tinyurl.com/6hulky
